name: Old Fashioned
method: Muddle sugar with bitters and water. Add bourbon and ice. Stir well. Garnish with orange peel and cherry.

name: Espresso Martini
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Mojito
method: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup. Add lime juice and rum. Fill with crushed ice. Top with soda water. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Aperol Spritz
method: Build in glass over ice. Add Aperol, then Prosecco, then soda water. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Negroni
method: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Virgin Mojito
method: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup. Add lime juice. Fill with crushed ice. Top with soda water. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Gin Fizz
method: Dry shake all ingredients. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a highball glass. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Cosmopolitan
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Margarita
method: Rub rim of glass with lime and dip in salt. Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Manhattan
method: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Daiquiri
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

name: Martini
method: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish as desired.

name: Whiskey Sour
method: Dry shake all ingredients. Add ice and shake again. Strain into glass.

name: Pina Colada
method: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Pour into glass.

name: Moscow Mule
method: Build in mug over ice. Add vodka, lime juice, and ginger beer.

name: French 75
method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into flute. Top with champagne.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
method: Build in glass over ice. Add rum, lime juice, and ginger beer.

name: Boulevardier
method: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

name: Paloma
method: Build in glass over ice. Add tequila and grapefruit juice. Top with soda water.

name: Sazerac
method: Rinse glass with absinthe. Stir remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Tom Collins
method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into glass. Top with soda water.

name: Mai Tai
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass over crushed ice.

name: Sidecar
method: Rim glass with sugar. Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Bloody Mary
method: Build in glass over ice. Add all ingredients and stir well.

name: Gimlet
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

name: White Russian
method: Build in glass over ice. Add vodka and coffee liqueur. Float cream on top.

name: Last Word
method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

name: Penicillin
method: Shake blended scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup, and ginger syrup with ice. Strain into glass over ice. Float Islay scotch on top.
